text: application by asic under s.1324(4) corporations act for interim injunctions
whether court has regard only to whether serious question to be tried and where balance of convenience lies
asic v sweeney [2001] nswsc 114 , asic v parkes [2001] nswsc 377 ; (2001) 38 acsr 355 , asic v pegasus leveraged options group pty ltd (2002) 41 acsr 561 followed
